hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e set -u
{% if 'skip_script_execution' in job_config and job_config['skip_script_execution'] %} exit 0 {% endif %}
# This script relies on `systemd` commands.
# Update Salt config for SLS in common.salt.master.update_config common.salt.minion.update_config do sudo salt-call \ --out json \ state.sls $SLS \ test=False | tee salt.output.json
# Capture errors from Salt. # At the moment salt does not return exit/error code. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/18510 /srv/states/bootstrap/bootstrap.dir/modules/utils/check_salt_output.py \ salt.output.json
done
# Start Salt services with new config.
sudo systemctl restart salt-master # Pause for 5 sec. ping -c 5 salt
sudo systemctl restart salt-minion # Pause for 5 sec. ping -c 5 salt
